Description:
Shuttering carpenter is responsible for making shutters and assembling system form-work for structures such as columns, beams, slabs, walls, foundations and other similar structures. The candidate should have good knowledge of safe working practices. The main duties of a shuttering carpenter are:
Setting out the work area, following engineering plans. Using hand and power tools to cut plywood, wood and assemble shutters/boxes and panels using screws.
Reading of drawings/projects/plans in English and independent work are mandatory.Skills
